li.a: Leverett's Chapel ISD Federal Report Card 2018-19

div.data-react-data-bundle: {"notifications":[{"id":7846,"message":"Our governor today, April 17th, released another Executive Order for schools to remain closed for the duration of this 2019-2020 school year. Even though the doors of Leverett's Chapel will remain closed this year, this does not mean the learning will cease. All of our staff and administrators will continue to send assignments home weekly for the students to continue their learning. We are saddened to hear this news but we know it's in our best interests to do what we have to do to remain healthy. Our staff will be there for the students if they need any help with their work. Students, please continue to do the work to the best of your ability. In this trying time, it's our parents who have taken a more active role in teaching our children. Please reach out to our teachers if you have any questions. We will continue to offer lunch until the last day of school. I also want our seniors and our senior parents to know we haven't forgotten about you. It is my goal to have a senior graduation at some point in some form or fashion. I know they deserve something. At this time, with no crystal ball, I don't know when or how that will happen. I appreciate everyone's patience and understand as we negotiate our way through this unforeseen crisis in our country. Please continue to be safe and we will get through this!\r\n\r\nJosh Johnson, Superintendent","type":"banner"}]}

div.div: The primary mission of the District is to provide quality educational experiences to all students and a safe environment which will make possible their social, economic and educational development. All students will be encouraged to learn and encouraged to develop to their full potential and become responsible citizens of our democracy.

span.data-emptytext: Leverett's Chapel Independent School District provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment
span.data-value:
Leverett's Chapel Independent School District provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment.
Adoption of Tax Rate: Leverett's Chapel ISD adopted a tax rate that will lower taxes for maintenance and operations than last year's tax rate. The tax rate will effectively be lowered by 8.69% and will lower taxes for maintenance and operations on a $100,000 home by approximately $101.70

p.span:
Leverett's Chapel Independent School District provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment.
Adoption of Tax Rate: Leverett's Chapel ISD adopted a tax rate that will lower taxes for maintenance and operations than last year's tax rate. The tax rate will effectively be lowered by 8.69% and will lower taxes for maintenance and operations on a $100,000 home by approximately $101.70

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout thats similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click read more to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. Youll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
